MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the PA2 postcode area of  Paisley affecting properties in Fairway Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site and in order to complete repairs to faulty equipment at the Skye Crescent Substation, we now need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 11:50am. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:53am on the 17th of April 2021
